bind_password.description: Password to authenticate the Bind user.

bind_user.description: Bind user to be used for authenticating on the LDAP server.

ldap_host.description: The LDAP server to connect to.

start_tls.description: Upgrade TLS to secure the connection (default: false).

tls.description: Enable TLS encryption for LDAP (LDAPS) (default: false).

tls_insecure.description: Don't verify server TLS certificate (default: false).

attributes.description: The map of attributes of this object; each attribute can be multi-valued.

dn.description: The Distinguished Name (DN) of the object, as the concatenation of its RDN (unique among siblings) and its parent's DN.

object_classes.description: The set of classes this object conforms to (e.g. organizationalUnit, inetOrgPerson).
